general Motors CEO Fritz Henderson says that the automaker has received serious bids from three outside companies for its Hummer unit , but that it is holding talks with two potential suitors .通用汽车公司总裁弗里茨汉德森说，该公司已收到严重的出价从三个外部公司的悍马单位，但它是举行会谈的两个潜在买家。
he complains of the expectations women place upon their potential suitors , emboldened by the growing surplus of men .他抱怨说现在女性对未来配偶的期望过高，尤其是在剩男不断堆积的情况下。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'member of a retinue', also in sense 2): from Anglo-Norman French seutor, from Latin secutor, from sequi 'follow'

entry.def: A woman's suitor is a man who wants to marry her.

example.ex: My mother had a suitor who adored her.
example.tran: 我妈妈曾经有一个爱慕她的追求者。

entry.tran: 有意收购另一公司的公司(或机构)
entry.def: A suitor is a company or organization that wants to buy another company.

example.ex: The company was making little progress in trying to find a suitor...
example.tran: 该公司试图找到一家收购公司，但进展甚微。

example.ex: Whatever is offered by the bank is unlikely to be improved on by any rival suitor.
example.tran: 其他竞争收购方不大可能开出比这家银行更高的价码。

means.word_mean: 1. a man who courts a woman;

sentences.sentence: "a suer for the hand of the princess"

su追求+itor……人→n.求婚者,[法律]原告

sentences.en: She can’t make up her mind which of her many suitors she should marry.
sentences.cn: 她无法作出决定究竟嫁给众多求婚者中的哪一位。

sentences.en: They’ve both asked her to go out with them,but Vera is playing a waiting game until she finds out which one of her suitors has the most money!
sentences.cn: 他们都请维拉同他们一起外出,但是维拉却在等待,等她发现哪一个求婚者的钱最多!
